/circle6 Examine the vulva and perineum for the presence of any swelling or pus.

C. Management/counselling
/circle6 Diet and rest:
/lozenge6 As in the second and third visits, emphasise the importance of nutrition. 
/circle6 Contraception:
/lozenge6 Emphasise the importance of using contraceptive methods for spacing or limiting
